content.rendered:
Thai Soup

Ingredients

Ingredients
1 Cube Vegetable Stock in 500ml Water
Chopped Celery and Spring Onion
1 Packet 2 Minute Noodles
Fry’s Polony/Silcing Sausage, Cut into Thin Strips

Directions

Simmer chopped celery and spring onion in water for 30 min. Add noodles and Fry’s Vegetarian Polony/Silcing Sausage 2 min before serving. Add salt to taste.
